360340.name: J.U.L.I.A.:Among the Stars - Soundtrack, Hintbook, Untold
360340.description:
You asked for the soundtrack? We've decided to bring you much more!

This DLC contains:

  • Over 40 minutes of music from J.U.L.I.A.: Among the Stars
  • Beautifully illustrated 65 pages long Hintbook including tips how to get all STEAM achievements

And as a little bonus a full game J.U.L.I.A.: Untold

Wait! Full game? What?

We made J.U.L.I.A.: Untold in 2012 as an iOS game. It's a pure puzzle game based upon the blueprint construction puzzle in J.U.L.I.A.: Among the Stars. However here's the catch. In J.U.L.I.A.: Untold you are going to unlock new tricky tiles like for example wireless connectors, which will cause your brain hate us. As a reward, there are five unique story sequences which tells the story before the events of J.U.L.I.A.: Among the Stars occured.

We've remastered J.U.L.I.A.: Untold so it runs now on Windows, OSX and Linux and improved it so it's a bit !

So... Why was Rachel Manners cryojailed?
360340.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
